snippet: The death of Sunanda Pushkar stunned many in Delhi’s journalistic and political circles, many of whom had followed the twists in her life since she met Shashi Tharoor.
abstract: Sunanda Pushkar, wife of Indian politician Shashi Tharoor, is found dead in hotel room after their marital drama was played out publicly on Twitter; speculation is rampant about whether overexposure on social media played significant role in her demise; cause of her death has not yet been determined.
lead_paragraph: The death of Sunanda Pushkar stunned many in Delhi’s journalistic and political circles, many of whom had followed the twists in her life since she met Shashi Tharoor.

headline.main: After Love Unravels in Media, Indian Politician’s Wife Is Found Dead
headline.print_headline: After Love Unravels in Media, Indian Politician’s Wife Is Found Dead
